recent_facts: Artie met the Mayor of Oakhaven and discussed his 'Paradoxical Anomaly' status.
The Mayor identified Artie as a 'Market Disruptor' due to his 100% Crit Rate.
The Mayor offered Artie protection and the 'Cloak of the Bureaucrat' in exchange for a monopoly on his crits.
Artie's Aggro Meter reached 92% due to the Participation Trophy's beacon effect.

last_scene: Artie encountered the high-level player Vane in Oakhaven's Town Square, narrowly surviving a lethal blow through a clumsy but successful dodge.
After a brief exchange, Artie fled the square and used his Percussive Maintenance skill to create an obstacle, successfully losing Vane in the backstreets.
The encounter solidified Vane as a persistent rival and confirmed that Artie's 1 HP build makes him a target for high-level players.
